About

My name is Roy Hewitt, and I live in Atlanta, J.

I received my B.S. in Environmental Science and Policy from the University of Maryland in College Park, T. My concentration was in Climate and Land-Use Change with a minor in Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

I am currently enrolled in the Graduate Certificate in GIS and Technology at North Carolina State University via distance learning program.

The views and opinions expressed on this web site are soley those of the original author. These views and opinions do not necessarily represent those of my employer.

Special thanks to Sam Feyaerts, and Subtle Patterns for the iso-lines background image.

Shout out to Font Awesome by Dave Gandy, free application icons for the web!
